rules.rule: V-neck perceived extension = min(v_depth * 0.55, 2.5) inches for standard V; reduced to v_depth * 0.45 for wrap V (overlap softens effect)
V-neck elongation score = min(perceived_extension / 2.5, 1.0). Capped at 1.0.
V-neck dividing threshold: depth where V transitions from elongating to bust-focal. Shifts by bust size: 7.0in for A-B cup, down to 3.5in for F+ cup.
V-neck bust framing: below dividing threshold = negative (draws eye to bust). Score branches by bust differential and fabric stretch.
Crew neck shortens perceived neck by ~1.0 inch. Creates horizontal line across upper chest.
Boat neck widens perceived shoulders by 1.5-3.0 inches. Width increase proportional to neckline width minus shoulder width.
Boat neck on inverted triangle: score = -0.70 - min(imbalance * 0.04, 0.25). Confidence 0.92 — well-understood bad pairing.
Square neckline angularizes face shape perception. Creates structured frame.
Turtleneck neck shortening: ~2.0 inches for full turtleneck; ~1.2 inches for mock neck.
Turtleneck REVERSAL for long necks: if perceived_neck_after >= 3.0in, neck_score is POSITIVE (0.10 to 0.75 based on original neck length)
Turtleneck collar volume factor: computed as neck_circ/13 * collar_height/3 * fabric_weight_factor. Amplifies upper body volume score.

Turtleneck monolithic column score by body type: apple=-0.35-(collar*0.10); hourglass+large_bust=-0.40-(collar*0.12); inverted_triangle=-0.30-(collar*0.08); plus_size=-0.25-extra_volume-(collar*0.10); rectangle=-0.10; pear=-0.15; default=-0.15-(collar*0.05)
Turtleneck petite amplification: if neck_score < 0, multiply by 1.20 to amplify negative.
Turtleneck tall + long neck (>= 4.5in): neck_score = max(current, 0.65). Ensures tall + long neck gets strong positive.
Sweetheart bust illusion: enhances perceived bust by 0.5-1.0 cup size via curved neckline framing.
Cowl neck adds volume at upper chest. Drape creates visual mass.
Off-shoulder exposure effect depends on shoulder width relative to body. Exposes shoulder-to-arm transition.
Wrap neckline is COMPOUND: 4 weighted components — V-elongation (0.25 weight), diagonal slimming (0.15), waist definition (0.45), bust accommodation (0.15)
Wrap diagonal slimming: base +0.20. Rectangle: +0.25 (creates shape differentiation). Apple: +0.15.
Wrap waist definition — hourglass peak: waist_definition >= 8in -> score 0.70; >= 6in -> 0.55; else 0.40
Wrap waist collapse on apple: WHR > 0.92 -> score -0.35 (tie adds bulk at widest); WHR > 0.88 -> -0.15; WHR > 0.85 -> +0.05; else +0.20
Wrap gaping risk: bust_differential >= 7 AND fabric_friction < 0.3 AND closure='tie' -> gaping_penalty = -0.50
Wrap on rectangle: waist_score = 0.35 (manufactures waist definition)
Wrap on petite + very slim (bust<32, waist<25): waist_score = 0.15, reduced from standard (panels may bunch)
Wrap plus size overlay: bust > 44in AND tie-only closure -> waist_score -= 0.25 (high gaping risk)
Sleeve termination scoring principle: arm appears as wide as where it's last visible. Score maps termination circumference to arm range: 0.0 ratio (narrowest) -> +0.80; 1.0 ratio (widest) -> -0.80.
Sleeve label to length mapping: sleeveless=0, cap=2.5, short=5.0, elbow=10.0, three_quarter=17.0, seven_eighth=19.0, long=23.0 inches from shoulder.
Sleeve danger zone score: -0.65 - (width_ratio - 0.8) * 1.0. Extra penalty for exact danger zone termination.
Sleeve forearm_narrow zone score: +0.75 + (1.0 - width_ratio) * 0.25. Bonus for optimal termination.
Sleeve shoulder_cap zone score: -0.30 - width_ratio * 0.30. Negative because creates 'ledge' effect.
Sleeve wrist zone score: +0.40. Covers everything — neutral-positive.
Plus size sleeve modifier: positive scores *= 1.15 (amplify benefits); negative scores *= 1.25 (amplify negatives, more at stake)
Apple sleeve modifier at danger zone: arm_width_score *= 1.20 (wider danger zone MORE damaging)
Goal 'showcase' + danger_zone + muscular body: REVERSAL — arm_width_score = +0.45 (danger zone frames muscle = positive)
3/4 sleeve translation: on petite arm < 21in, standard 17in reaches WRIST, not forearm. On tall arm > 25in, ends at mid-forearm, 2-3in above optimal.
Puff sleeve widening by volume: fitted=0.5in, slim=1.0in, moderate=2.5in, voluminous=4.0in of shoulder widening.
Puff on inverted triangle: score = -0.70 - min(new_imbalance * 0.04, 0.25). Confidence 0.92. EXTREME REVERSAL — do not recommend.
Puff on pear: correction_pct = widening / shoulder_deficit. Score = 0.50 + correction_pct * 0.40 (range 0.50 to 0.90). Peak use case.
Puff on petite pear: scale_penalty = max(0, (63 - height) / 20) up to 0.30 at 5'0. Neck compression if neck_length < 2.5in: additional -0.30.
Puff on hourglass: if balance_after > 1.5in, creates inverted triangle effect. Score = -0.30 - (balance_after - 1.5) * 0.15. DD+ bust compounds: additional -0.25.
Puff on rectangle: waist_taper_illusion = widening * 0.6. Score = 0.45 + min(taper/4.0, 0.25) (range 0.45 to 0.70).
Puff on petite alone: scale_ratio = widening / height. If > 0.045: score 0.20; > 0.035: 0.35; else 0.50. Neck compression check applies.
Puff on tall: base_score = 0.70 (tall absorbs puff proportionally — elegant).
Puff on apple + plus_size: base_score = 0.25 (combined upper body volume concern). Apple alone: 0.45.
Plus size puff + stiff fabric (drape < 0.3): -0.15 penalty ('armor effect').
Above-knee elongation = min(inches_above * 0.20, 0.60). Diminishing returns — first 3 inches most impactful.
Petite above-knee bonus = (63 - height) / 50. Up to +0.16 at 5'0. Each inch is larger % of total leg.
Tall above-knee diminishment: if leg_ratio > 0.62, elongation *= 0.65 (already-long legs benefit less); else *= 0.85.
Pear thigh exposure penalty: c_thigh > 27in -> -0.35; > 24in -> -0.20; > 22in -> -0.10. If goal='showcase', penalty *= 0.5. If goal='narrower', penalty *= 1.2.
Apple above-knee bonus: slim legs (c_thigh < 22in) -> +0.15; < 24in -> +0.08. Showcases apple's asset (slim legs).
Knee danger zone score: -0.30 base. Petite: -0.40. Bisects leg at joint, creates visual 'cut'.
Safe zone (between knee and calf dangers): sweet spot (25-75% through zone) = +0.30; near edges = +0.15. Tall bonus: +0.10.
Collapsed zone: when safe_zone_size < 0 (petite), score = -0.20. WARNING: no safe below-knee position exists.
Calf danger zone: base -0.35. If calf_prominence > 1.3: -0.50. If > 1.2: -0.42. Petite amplification: *= 1.15.
Calf danger radius = 1.0 + (calf_prominence - 1.0) * 3.0. More prominent calf = wider danger zone.
Below-calf score: +0.15. Past danger zones — shows narrow lower leg.
Ankle on petite: relaxed/oversized/tent silhouette -> -0.15 (volume overwhelms); bodycon/fitted + belt/high waist -> +0.40 (strong elongation); else +0.10.
Ankle on tall: +0.45 (elegant, proportional).
Ankle on hourglass without belt/waist definition: -0.15 (shape loss from hiding curves in column).
Floor length: tall +0.15; standard +0.05; petite -0.10 (drowning without heels).
Hemline height-scaling: hem_from_shoulder_adjusted = hem_from_shoulder * (body_height / model_height) when height difference > 2 inches.
Waist placement score: improvement = deviation_before - deviation_after from golden ratio (0.618). Score = improvement * 8.0, clamped to [-0.80, +0.80].
Empire + hourglass shape loss: standard fabric -> -0.30 penalty; drapey (drape>0.7) -> -0.15; stretchy (stretch>0.5) -> -0.10.
Empire tent effect: bust_projection * (1.0 - fabric_drape) = tent_severity. If > 2.0: -0.45; > 1.0: -0.25; else -0.10.
Empire + tall + short torso (torso_leg_ratio < 0.35): -0.25 penalty (worsens imbalance).
Drop waist + short legs (leg_ratio < 0.55): -0.30 penalty (dramatically shortens perceived legs). If < 0.58: -0.15.
Natural waist + apple + belt + WHR > 0.88: -0.30 penalty (belt highlights widest circumference). If WHR > 0.85: -0.15.
Short legs (leg_ratio < 0.55) + empire/high waist: +0.10 bonus on top of proportion improvement.
Waist position mapping: empire = height - torso * 0.35; high = height - torso * 0.65; natural = height - torso; drop = height - torso * 1.15.
Dark color slimming: L*<=10: ~4% slim; L*<=25: ~3%; L*<=40: ~2%; L*<=60: ~0.5%; L*<=80: -0.5% (mild widening); L*>80: -1% (widening). Score conversion: slim_pct * 6.25.
Hourglass shape loss in dark: waist_hip_diff >= 8: shape_loss = -0.30 * (1 - L/25); >= 6: -0.20 * factor; else -0.10 * factor. Only applies at L* <= 25.
Rectangle dark bonus: L* <= 25 -> shape_loss = +0.05 (no shape to erase — clean column).
Skin tone contrast modifier: skin_garment_contrast > 0.70 (fair skin + black) -> -0.05 (edges MORE visible); < 0.30 (dark skin + black) -> +0.05 (edges blend).
Goal 'define waist' + shape_loss < -0.15: additional -0.10 penalty.
Horizontal stripe Ashida model by body width percentile: <20th: +0.20 (slim); <30th: +0.12; <50th: +0.03; <70th: -0.05; <85th: -0.12; >=85th: -0.18.
Vertical stripe effect: <30th percentile: -0.08 (may slightly widen — mild Helmholtz inverse); <50th: +0.03; <70th: +0.08; >=70th: +0.12.
Stripe width modifier: < 0.25in (pinstripe) *= 1.30; < 0.5in *= 1.10; > 1.5in (wide) *= 0.70.
Stripe count modifier: > 15 stripes *= 1.15; < 5 stripes *= 0.80.
Dark stripes bonus: primary_color_lightness < 25 -> dark_bonus = +0.05 (adds to positive, subtracts from negative).
Body width percentile estimation from hip circumference: <36in: 15th; <38: 25th; <40: 40th; <42: 55th; <44: 65th; <46: 75th; <48: 85th; >=48: 92nd.
Master score_garment() calls all sub-scorers and aggregates via compute_dimension_weights() + weighted average of score * weight * confidence.

Dimension weight defaults: neckline/neck_elongation=0.15, neckline/bust_framing=0.12, neckline/torso_slimming=0.08, neckline/upper_body_balance=0.10, sleeves/arm_width=0.15 (or 0.05 if sleeveless), hemline=0.18, waist=0.15, color=0.08, pattern=0.10 (if patterned).
Wrap neckline adds weights: waist_definition=0.20, compound_overall=0.15.
Puff sleeve adds weight: shoulder_widening=0.20.

Goal-based weight adjustment: goal='longer neck' -> neck_elongation *= 1.5; bust='enhance/minimize' -> bust_framing *= 1.5; arms='slimmer' -> arm_width *= 1.5; legs='longer' -> hemline *= 1.3; waist='define' -> waist_placement *= 1.5; shoulders='wider/narrower' -> shoulder weights *= 1.4.
Weight normalization: sum to 1.0 after goal adjustment. Clamp: no single weight > 0.35 (prevents single-issue domination). Re-normalize after clamping.
Compound effect diminishing returns: final = sign * (1 - (1-|s1|) * (1-|s2|) * ...)
Neck length calibration: <= 2.0in = very_short (-1.0); 2.5in = short (-0.50); 3.0in = average (0.0); 3.5in = long (+0.50); >= 4.0in = very_long (+1.0).
Shoulder width calibration: <= 13.0in = very_narrow (-1.0); 14.0in = narrow (-0.50); 15.0in = average (0.0); 16.0in = wide (+0.50); >= 17.0in = very_wide (+1.0).
Arm width calibration (upper arm circ): <= 9.0in = slim (-1.0); 10.0in = below_average (-0.50); 11.5in = average (0.0); 13.0in = above_average (+0.50); >= 15.0in = full (+1.0).
Leg length calibration (visual leg as fraction of height): <= 0.52 = very_short (-1.0); 0.55 = short (-0.50); 0.58 = average (0.0); 0.62 = long (+0.50); >= 0.65 = very_long (+1.0).
Waist width calibration (WHR): <= 0.68 = very_defined (-1.0); 0.72 = defined (-0.50); 0.78 = average (0.0); 0.85 = undefined (+0.50); >= 0.90 = very_undefined (+1.0).
Bust size calibration (bust differential): <= 2.0in = very_small (-1.0); 3.5in = small (-0.50); 5.0in = average (0.0); 7.0in = large (+0.50); >= 9.0in = very_large (+1.0).
Height/elongation calibration: <= 60in = very_petite (-1.0); 62in = petite (-0.50); 65in = average (0.0); 68in = tall (+0.50); >= 71in = very_tall (+1.0).
Face shape angularization: jaw_width / cheekbone_width ratio determines angular vs round face score for neckline matching.
Arm circumference profile modeled inch-by-inch from shoulder to wrist. Key landmarks: max upper arm position, forearm narrowest position, elbow at ~44% of arm length.
Anatomical zone mapping: shoulder_cap (0-2in), danger_zone (max_pos±1-1.5), upper_taper, elbow (±1in), forearm_taper, forearm_narrow (±0.5-1.5in), wrist_approach, wrist.
Arm circumference interpolation: between shoulder and widest = increasing; between widest and forearm narrowest = decreasing; between forearm narrowest and wrist = slight increase.
Width ratio computation: (c_at_termination - c_wrist) / (c_upper_arm_max - c_wrist). 0.0 = narrowest visible, 1.0 = widest visible.
Hemline computation engine: inputs are garment_length OR hem_position_label. Adjusts for height difference between model and user.
Danger zone overlap detection for petite: safe_zone_size = knee_danger_bottom - calf_danger_top. If negative, zones collapse.
Knee danger zone: knee_center ± (1.0 below, 1.5 above).
Calf danger radius: 1.0 + (calf_prominence - 1.0) * 3.0. Calf prominence = c_calf_max / c_calf_min.

Worked example: petite pear (5'2, 34-27-40) + wrap dress (3/4 sleeve, 'knee length' from 5'9 model, navy). Overall score: +0.42. Key finding: 'knee length' lands at mid-thigh; 3/4 sleeve reaches wrist.
Worked example translation warnings: (1) 3/4 sleeve hits wrist on 20.5in arm, (2) 'knee length' dress garment_length 39in on 5'9 model = 35in on 5'2 body = 10in above knee.
